attributes.action: To make plymouth safe to allow uber taxis or to have a permanent night bus
attributes.additional_details: We have been asking and fighting plymouth city Council on this and its been going on for so long. This needs to be sorted before  someone gets mugged raped or murdered
attributes.background: To make plymouth city Council fix this

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about licensing of local private hire services and local bus services are a matter for individual local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
